com.broadcom.bt.le.api
Class BleServerProfile

java.lang.Object
  com.broadcom.bt.le.api.BleServerProfile

public abstract class BleServerProfile
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a Bluetooth Low Energy profile in the server role. An application must extend this class to implement a new LE server profile. A BleServerProfile derived class contains a list of BleServerService objects that define services included in this profile.

Constructor Summary
BleServerProfile(Context ctxt, BleGattID appId, java.util.ArrayList<BleServerService> serviceArr)
          Constructs a new LE server profile identified by a unique ID, including the provided services.

BleServerProfile

public BleServerProfile(Context ctxt,
                        BleGattID appId,
                        java.util.ArrayList<BleServerService> serviceArr)
Constructs a new LE server profile identified by a unique ID, including the provided services.

Parameters:
ctxt - Application context
appId - Unique ID for this profile
serviceArr - List of services associated with this profile

cancelOpen

public void cancelOpen(java.lang.String bdaddr,
                       boolean isDirect)
Cancels an ongoing open operation to a peripheral GATT client.

Parameters:
bdaddr - Remote device address ("00:11:22:33:44:55" format)
isDirect - true if this is a direct connection/false for a passive background connection

setEncryption

public void setEncryption(java.lang.String bdaddr,
                          byte action)
Sets the desired encryption level for an active connection. This functino should only be called after a connection to a remote device has been established.

Parameters:
bdaddr - Address of remote device with a currently active connection
action - Encryptino level for the active connection
